verses.kjv: Bless the LORD, O my soul. O LORD my God, thou art very great; thou art clothed with honour and majesty.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD, my soul! LORD my God, you are incredibly great; you are wrapped in honor and majesty.

verses.kjv: Who coverest thyself with light as with a garment: who stretchest out the heavens like a curtain:
verses.ct: You cover yourself with light like a robe; you stretch out the heavens like a tent.

verses.kjv: Who layeth the beams of his chambers in the waters: who maketh the clouds his chariot: who walketh upon the wings of the wind:
verses.ct: You set the beams of your upper rooms on the waters; you ride the clouds as your chariot; you travel on the wings of the wind.

verses.kjv: Who maketh his angels spirits; his ministers a flaming fire:
verses.ct: You make your angels into spirits, and your servants into flames of fire.

verses.kjv: Who laid the foundations of the earth, that it should not be removed for ever.
verses.ct: You established the earth on its foundations so that it can never be shaken.

verses.kjv: Thou coveredst it with the deep as with a garment: the waters stood above the mountains.
verses.ct: You covered it with the ocean like a garment; the waters rose above the mountains.

verses.kjv: At thy rebuke they fled; at the voice of thy thunder they hasted away.
verses.ct: At your command they retreated; at the sound of your thunder they rushed away.

verses.kjv: They go up by the mountains; they go down by the valleys unto the place which thou hast founded for them.
verses.ct: They flowed over mountains and down through valleys to the place you designated for them.

verses.kjv: Thou hast set a bound that they may not pass over; that they turn not again to cover the earth.
verses.ct: You set a boundary they cannot cross, so they would never again cover the earth.

verses.kjv: He sendeth the springs into the valleys, which run among the hills.
verses.ct: He sends springs flowing into the valleys; they wind their way between the hills.

verses.kjv: They give drink to every beast of the field: the wild asses quench their thirst.
verses.ct: They provide water for every wild animal; the wild donkeys satisfy their thirst there.

verses.kjv: By them shall the fowls of the heaven have their habitation, which sing among the branches.
verses.ct: The birds of the heavens nest beside them and sing among the branches.

verses.kjv: He watereth the hills from his chambers: the earth is satisfied with the fruit of thy works.
verses.ct: He waters the mountains from his upper rooms; the earth is nourished by the results of your work.

verses.kjv: He causeth the grass to grow for the cattle, and herb for the service of man: that he may bring forth food out of the earth;
verses.ct: He makes grass grow for the livestock and plants for people to cultivate, bringing food from the earth—

verses.kjv: And wine that maketh glad the heart of man, and oil to make his face to shine, and bread which strengtheneth man’s heart.
verses.ct: wine that brings joy to the human heart, oil that makes the skin glow, and bread that sustains human strength.

verses.kjv: The trees of the LORD are full of sap; the cedars of Lebanon, which he hath planted;
verses.ct: The trees of the LORD are well nourished—the cedars of Lebanon that he planted.

verses.kjv: Where the birds make their nests: as for the stork, the fir trees are her house.
verses.ct: That is where the birds build their nests; the stork makes its home in the cypress trees.

verses.kjv: The high hills are a refuge for the wild goats; and the rocks for the conies.
verses.ct: The high mountains belong to the wild goats; the rocky cliffs shelter the hyraxes.

verses.kjv: He appointed the moon for seasons: the sun knoweth his going down.
verses.ct: He made the moon to mark the seasons; the sun knows when to set.

verses.kjv: Thou makest darkness, and it is night: wherein all the beasts of the forest do creep forth.
verses.ct: You bring darkness, and night falls—that is when all the forest animals come out.

verses.kjv: The young lions roar after their prey, and seek their meat from God.
verses.ct: The young lions roar for their prey, seeking their food from God.

verses.kjv: The sun ariseth, they gather themselves together, and lay them down in their dens.
verses.ct: When the sun rises, they retreat and lie down in their dens.

verses.kjv: Man goeth forth unto his work and to his labour until the evening.
verses.ct: Then people head out to their work and labor until evening comes.

verses.kjv: O LORD, how manifold are thy works! in wisdom hast thou made them all: the earth is full of thy riches.
verses.ct: LORD, how countless are the things you have made! You crafted them all with wisdom; the earth is filled with your creations.

verses.kjv: So is this great and wide sea, wherein are things creeping innumerable, both small and great beasts.
verses.ct: And then there is the vast, wide sea, teeming with countless creatures—living things both small and large.

verses.kjv: There go the ships: there is that leviathan, whom thou hast made to play therein.
verses.ct: Ships sail across it, and the leviathan you formed plays in its waters.

verses.kjv: These wait all upon thee; that thou mayest give them their meat in due season.
verses.ct: All of these creatures depend on you to give them their food at the right time.

verses.kjv: That thou givest them they gather: thou openest thine hand, they are filled with good.
verses.ct: When you provide it, they gather it up; when you open your hand, they are filled with good things.

verses.kjv: Thou hidest thy face, they are troubled: thou takest away their breath, they die, and return to their dust.
verses.ct: When you withdraw your favor, they are terrified; when you take away their breath, they die and return to dust.

verses.kjv: Thou sendest forth thy spirit, they are created: and thou renewest the face of the earth.
verses.ct: When you send out your spirit, they are created, and you renew the surface of the earth.

verses.kjv: The glory of the LORD shall endure for ever: the LORD shall rejoice in his works.
verses.ct: May the glory of the LORD last forever; may the LORD take delight in what he has made.

verses.kjv: He looketh on the earth, and it trembleth: he toucheth the hills, and they smoke.
verses.ct: He looks at the earth and it trembles; he touches the mountains and they pour out smoke.

verses.kjv: I will sing unto the LORD as long as I live: I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.
verses.ct: I will sing to the LORD as long as I live; I will praise my God for the rest of my days.

verses.kjv: My meditation of him shall be sweet: I will be glad in the LORD.
verses.ct: May my thoughts about him be pleasing; I will find my joy in the LORD.

verses.kjv: Let the sinners be consumed out of the earth, and let the wicked be no more. Bless thou the LORD, O my soul. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.ct: May sinners vanish from the earth and the wicked exist no longer. Praise the LORD, my soul! Praise the LORD!
